thread.section_title: Loopmasters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Loopmasters | www.loopmasters.com | 4 of 115
thread.title: Anthony

author: Anthony
title: Anthony
text:
There are a lot of good quality libraries for sounds, you want to do a lot of digging though and really pay attention to the reviews as well as how many reviews a product has. I have not found a sample pack that I regret downloading yet.
If you're a very creative and divergent type there are a lot of unique and strange sample libraries that can cater to anyone looking for something different.
